量化小助手

关于项目

Trading Robot

基本架构。

策略相关的文件都放在 strategy 里面。
bot 是一个机器人的 wrapper，每一个策略由一个 bot 来维护。

Usage

1.编辑配置文件

invest-example.json


"exchange": "binance",
  "paris": [
    {
         currency:"BTC/USDT",
         amount: 10 
    }
  ]
  },
{
  "exchange": "bittrex",
},
  ],
  }

$ ./invest.js invest.json

CCXT 的文档

fetchTickers()
fetchOpenOrders()
createOrder()
cancelOrder()
fetchBalance()

Config Files:

```

{
“exchanges_unencrypted”: [
{
“exchange”: “binance”,
“apiKey”: “XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX”,
“apiSecret”: “XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX”
},
{
“exchange”: “bittrex”,
“inactive”: 1,
“apiKey”: “XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX”,
“apiSecret”: “XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX”
},
],
“exchange_for_fiat”: “okcoinusd”
}
```
